summary: Join Mariposa & her new friend, Princess Catania, in this magical adventure to save the fairy land of Shimmervale. Together, the girls learn that with great friends, the sky is the limit!
cast: Kelly Sheridan|Maryke Hendrikse|Tabitha St. Germain|Kathleen Barr|Mariee Devereux|Alessandro Juliani|Jane Barr|Alistair Abell|Russell Roberts|Sam Vincent
title: Barbie Mariposa y la princesa de las hadas
